p: DNA for long-read sequencing on the Pacbio platform was extracted from 10 ml of cultured bacteria as previously described [ 87]. Data were assembled using version 2.3 of the Pacbio SMRT analysis pipeline ( https://smrt-analysis.readthedocs.io/en/latest/SMRT-Pipe-Reference-Guide-v2.2.0/). The structure of the initial assembly was checked against a parallel assembly using Miniasm [ 99] which showed general agreement. The Pacbio best practice for circularizing contigs was followed using Minimus [ 100] and the chromosomal contiguous sequence in each assembly was re-orientated to begin at the thrA gene. Illumina short read sequence data were used to correct for SNPs and indels using iCORN2 ( http://icorn.sourceforge.net/). The finished sequences were then annotated using Prokka [ 98].
